title: DONATE MONTHLY
description: Every Flame Starts with a Spark,Even a small donation of about Rs. 2000 per month can provide nutritious meals and quality education to a child in India.

title:
DONATE 
BOOKS
description: By donating just 2350 rupees, you can provide stationary for one kid for a year. A child needs at least 10 books, 35 copies, and approximately 48 pens and pencils.

title: SHOW YOUR TALENT
description: Be a part of the change by showcasing your talents at our nearest center and inspire others.
